docs.summary: Order line item entity

members.name: description
members.doc: item description, for instance for domain product the domain will be used as name

members.name: overrideAmount
members.doc: amount that overrides the one that calculated by product price plan

members.name: taxes
members.doc: list of taxes. If taxes passed, tax included value must to be set as well. Can be passed only for ONE TIME order.

members.name: taxIncluded
members.doc: is tax included. If set to true, taxes must be set as well. Can be passed only for ONE TIME order.

members.name: overridePeriodStart
members.doc: optional order period start date - if provided, will override the period start of invoice and service upon payment

members.name: contractSwitchType
members.doc: Possible overriding the switch contract type value

members.doc: a list of the local supported payment methods per currency+countries+cycle combinations of the given filter

members.name: fields
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN - unknown interval unit
  • DAY - day
  • WEEK - week
  • MONTH - month
  • YEAR - year

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • DRAFT
  • PAID
  • VOID
  • REFUNDED
  • DECLINED
  • PAYMENT_IN_PROGRESS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ADYEN
  • WORLDPAY

messages.name: _com_wixpress_billing_api_v1_ThreeDsChallengeDisplaySize_ThreeDsChallengeDisplaySizeEnum
messages.displayName: Three Ds Challenge Display Size Enum Object

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SMALL - 250 x 400
  • MEDIUM - 390 x 400
  • LARGE - 600 x 400

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • VISA
  • MASTERCARD
  • AMEX - American Express
  • DISCOVER
  • JCB
  • DINERS - Diners Club
  • CARTE_BLUE - Carte Bancaire
  • ELO
  • UNION_PAY

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SEPA

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • BOLETO - Boleto Bancário, simply referred to as Boleto (English: Ticket) is a cash-based payment method used in Brazil. A boleto can be paid at ATMs, branch facilities and internet banking of any Bank, Post Office, Lottery Agent and some supermarkets until its due date. After the due date it can only be paid at the issuer bank facilities.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SOFORT - IDEAL = 2;

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • FRAUDULENT
  • REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • REGULAR - regular internal calculation done by the billing system
  • FULL_AMOUNT_PERIOD - Switch to a a new package prices without credit/refund calculated, and dates will be from now

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • MANUAL
  • OFF
  • AUTO

service statuses Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ACTIVE
  • CANCELED
  • FRAUDULENT
  • SUSPENDED
  • UNPAID
